title: DATA DIRECTORY
description: Shared data can be discovered and searched across distributed ledgers using blockchain technology.

title: DATA CERTIFICATION
description: Data entry returned from a search query must contain a certificate ensuring that the entry has been validated.

title: ACCESS AUTHORIZATION
description: Authorization includes data access control and an executable agreement script to fetch the data.

title: ACCESS REVOCATION
description: The access rights to data items can be revoked that the change with low latency can be reflected.

title: AUDITABILITY
description: All transactions on all data items are logged on the ledger for open and transparent auditing.
